paragraphs: And I've been all about front end development since April 2020, when I realized coding and design was my jam. Since then I've been committed to self-studying, and every day I'm learning something new. I have a great handle on HTML, JavaScript and CSS, and I'm especially excited about creating React apps.
I've also created WordPress themes, D3 data visualizations and currently I'm studying Bootstrap and Redux.

My learning process has been guided by the curriculum at FreeCodeCamp.com, where I've earned four certificates so far. I also learn by constantly creating new projects and researching different approaches, methods and frameworks.
